text: @realDonaldTrump You had a big stock market surge because you had the biggest stock market drop in the history of the stock market meanwhile we have more Coronavirus cases in the world thanks to your inability to lead now you stopped Federal funding for testing

entity.description: This page is a timeline of Tweets with the latest information and updates on COVID-19 from experts, journalists, health authorities and other trusted sources from around the world. For more on COVID-19, visit: twitter.com/explore/tabs/covid-19
